department: Federal Economic Development Agency for Southern Ontario
short_summary: ACAN for dedicated rental vehicles for government employees
description: FedDev Ontario requires dedicated rental vehicles for authorized government employees traveling on government business in Ontario and Quebec. The Contractor(s) must provide dedicated rental vehicles for some or all of the four (4) office locations in Ontario in accordance with the standards established by FedDev Ontario. The requirement is for up to eight (8) rental vehicles, to replace aging Agency vehicles for our four (4) office locations in Ontario.

full_summary:
### **Government Tender Announcement**
#### **Title**: 
ACAN: Dedicated Rental Vehicles for Government Employees
#### **Reference Number**: 
#cb-6490-13820285
#### **Number of Amendments**: 
1
#### **Publication Date**: 
June 16, 2023
#### **Tender Closing Date**: 
July 4, 2023, at 2:00 PM EDT
#### **Amendment Date**: 
July 4, 2023
#### **Contract Term**: 
Not anticipated at this time.
#### **Status**: 
Expired
#### **Procurement Category**: 
SRV (Services)
#### **UNSPSC Description**: 
78111808: Vehicle rental
#### **Trade Agreements**: 
This tender is open to suppliers participating in the following trade agreements:
* North American Free Trade Agreement (NAFTA)
* Canada-Chile Free Trade Agreement (CCFTA)
* World Trade Organization Agreement on Government Procurement (WTO GPA)
* Canada-Panama Free Trade Agreement
* Canada-Ukraine Free Trade Agreement (CUFTA)
* Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)
* Comprehensive and Progressive Agreement for Trans-Pacific Partnership (CPTPP)
* Canada-Korea Free Trade Agreement (CKFTA)
* Canada-Peru Free Trade Agreement (CPFTA)
* Canada-Honduras Free Trade Agreement
* Canada-Colombia Free Trade Agreement
* Canada-European Union Comprehensive Economic and Trade Agreement (CETA)
#### **Regions of Opportunity**: 
Worldwide
#### **Regions of Delivery**: 
Government contractors are required to deliver the dedicated rental vehicles to the following locations:
* Ottawa
* Peterborough
* Waterloo
* Toronto
#### **Contracting Entity Name**: 
Federal Economic Development Agency for Southern Ontario
#### **Contact Information**: 
* Name: Nathan Nguyen
* Email: [nathan.nguyen@feddevontario.gc.ca](mailto:nathan.nguyen@feddevontario.gc.ca)
* Phone: (343) 540-5886

The Federal Economic Development Agency for Southern Ontario (FedDev Ontario) invites suppliers to participate in an Advanced Contract Award Notice (ACAN) for dedicated rental vehicles for government employees. The contract term is not anticipated at this time, as FedDev Ontario intends to award the contract to a pre-identified supplier following the closing date of the tender. Suppliers are invited to signal their interest in bidding by submitting a statement of capabilities.

The contract requires the provision of dedicated rental vehicles for government employees in Ontario and Quebec for
